CustomField.description:
If(ISNULL( Date_Closed__c ),
(today() -(Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)),
(Date_Closed__c ) - (Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - 2*( floor((Date_Closed__c ) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL( Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate ),
(today() -(Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)),
DATEVALUE(Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate) -(Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - 2*( floor((DATEVALUE(Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))
CustomField.label: Onboarding Age
